Cody & Victoria

The Wedding

December 16th - 19th, 2016

Our Story

We first met on PlentyOfFish.com



We were both skeptical with the whole idea of online dating at first, but it turns out that meeting someone online isn't as bad as it may sound.



Her first message to him was"Hey". After that, it was game over.

After talking for a while, he decided to finally ask her out on a date. She was estatic to finally get to meet him, and he was nervous. Only a couple of hours before the date, he bailed.

The What

Join us for a weekend of fun with plans to include put-put golf, bowling, games, food, and the ceremony!

We rented a cabin for the weekend of December 16th - 19th. Checkout is at 10am Monday.
